sec.div: 2.7. Effects of Dose and Time Period on Larvicidal Activity
sec.p: Essential oils that yielded more than 90% mortality after 30 min of treatment in preliminary screening were further evaluated at different concentrations from 2.5 to 200 Âµg/mL at different time intervals (10 to 120 min) for the determination of LC 50 and LC 90 values. Larvae were considered dead if they were immobile and unable to reach the water surface [ 26].
